
```{r, include=FALSE}
?mat2df
```

```{r}
# Load necessary library
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Load the data from the CSV file
df <- read.csv("discrete_mixture_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)["value"]

# Check the structure of the loaded data
str(df)

# View the first few rows of the data
head(df)
```

```{r}
# Assume df is your original dataframe
set.seed(123)  # for reproducibility
indexes <- sample(1:nrow(df), size = 0.7 * nrow(df))

train_df <- df[indexes, ]
test_df <- df[-indexes, ]

```

```{r}
train_clust_df <- mat2df(mat = train_df)

str(train_clust_df)

test_clust_df <- mat2df(mat = test_df)

str(test_clust_df)

```
